attributes.action: Convicted rioters/looters to be banned from local amenities : football stadium, shopping centres, pubs, clubs.. etc
attributes.additional_details: Those convicted of looting and riotous behaviour should be banned from going to areas of public entertainment and shopping centres. For example: football grounds, Cinemas, pubs, nightclubs, shopping centres, golf courses, bowling alleys etc. If they cannot respect their neighbours and communities then they should not be allowed to enjoy the benefits of that community.
